name: You are Pea
description:
WASD to move, stack and jump! Use Tab to switch between awake Peas and Esc to pause the game or restart. 

You are Pea. You want to return home and need the help of your kin. 
Stack and solve puzzles while trying to lead the Peas back home.

Credit for the font: 
https://www.fontspace.com/good-boy-font-f45611

Credit for the titlescreen/thumbnail: dougbennett
